segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing out of the faucet, completely filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually overflowing onto the counter and down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water is creating quite a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely unaware, polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in the growing puddle, but she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am genuinely surprised by her complete obliviousness to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone not feel their foot getting wet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's fascinating how absorbed she is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water is going to cause a lot of damage very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the mess it will make if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little fearful of what could happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is surely going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm and the chaos is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
